I had surgery for a pilonidal cyst two years ago. Before the surgery it was an absolute nightmare with it getting infected and then drained constantly. 


The surgery wasn't bad, but the recovery was long and awful. It was like 50 days of daily packing changes. But I haven't had any issues since!


I don't know if you need surgery or have already had it, but good luck. I know it sucks.
